Name: Reflective Clothing or Devices, Bicycles etc.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York in relation to requiring persons who ride bicycles or operate roller skates, in-line skates or skateboards at night to wear luminescent or reflective clothing or to use luminescent or reflective devices.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

      Section 1. Section 19-176.1 of the administrative code of the city of New York, as enacted by local law number 43 for the year 1996, is amended by adding a new subdivision e thereto to read as follows:
      e. No person shall ride a bicycle or operate roller skates, in-line skates or a skateboard during the period from sunset until sunrise unless such person shall wear luminescent or reflective clothing or helmet or use luminescent or reflective devices on the pedals or wheels of the bicycle, roller-skates, in-line skates or skateboard being ridden or operated.
      ï¿½2. This local law shall take effect immediately.
